message.entry: File {0} does not have EXIF metadata. Use the ''ExposureTimes'' parameter to provide exposure information.
File {0} does not have exposure metadata. Use the ''ExposureTimes'' parameter to provide exposure information.
''ExposureTimes'' must be a vector of length same as the number of input images.
Input must contain at least two images.
Specify ''ExposureTimes'' when input is a cell array of image matrices.
